text: Carlos Augusto Cardoso Gorito (born May 17, 1986) is a Brazilian who lives and performs in South Korea as a television personality and embassy worker. He is currently a cast member in the talk show Non-Summit. In 2015, he wrote a column for the JoongAng Ilbo newspaper on topics like association football, Korean Wave and traditional festivals. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
